actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 73 of title 10, United States Code, to provide for the disposition of the retirement benefits between members and former members of the armed forces and their spouses.

summary.text: Provides that applicable State law shall determine the disposition of retired or retainer pay upon the dissolution of a marriage of any member or former member of the armed forces.

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 73 of title 10, United States Code, to provide for the disposition of the retirement benefits between members and former members of the armed forces and their spouses.
